remarks: Generate a height-3 element (2-dimensional plane) from an atom. (Contributed by NM, 3-May-2012.)
statement:
2dim.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2dim.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
2dim.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2dim $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> E. q e. A E. r e. A ( P C ( P .\/ q ) /\ ( P .\/ q ) C ( ( P .\/ q ) .\/ r ) ) ) $.
$d .\/ q r $.
$d A q r $.
$d K q r $.
$d P q r $.
